duties_responsibilities.duty: Hiring and leading technical teams within the digital & IT department.
Analyzing, architecting, designing, developing, and supporting all software application systems.
Managing software engineering schedules, budget, and resource allocation.
Collaborating with product teams on priorities and infrastructure/security teams for best practices.
Developing and following best practices in agile methodologies, building secure applications according to modern best practices.
Assisting software development team to attain optimal performance through removing technical obstacles.
Providing leadership, development, and technical vision to the engineering team and consultants/contractors across different geographic locations.
Managing joint development with 3rd party vendors as well as outsourced development.
Improving team processes and handling resource conflicts when they arise.

education_certification.credential: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
